## DurableExecutionApiClient class

Durable execution client which uses an API-based LambdaClient with built-in error logging. By default, the Lambda client will have custom timeouts set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DurableExecutionApiClient implements DurableExecutionClient
```

**Implements:** [DurableExecutionClient](./durable-execution-sdk-js.durableexecutionclient.md)
